name: 7th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Science
content: 7th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Science (BIOEN 2024) January 13-14, 2024, Virtual Conference https://bioen2024.org/ Scope 7th International Conference on Biomedical Engineering and Science (BIOEN 2024) aims to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on recent systems and techniques in the broad field of Biomedical Engineering. Topics of interest · Biomedical Electronics · Clinical BioChemistry · Biomechatronics · Biomaterials · Biophysics · Biomechanics of Injury and Wound Healing · Bionics · Cellular, Tissue and Genetic Engineering · Medical Engineering Systems & Applications · Biomedical Intelligence & Clinical Data Analysis · Orthopedic Bioengineering · Rehabilitation Engineering · Systems Physiology · Bionanotechnology · Bioinformatics of Diseases · Bioinstrumentation · Neural Engineering · Toxicology · Immunology · Social and Preventive Medicine · Sport and Exercise Medicine · Injury Prevention and Health Protection · Medical Robotics · Computational Systems Biology Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by November 05, 2023\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal of Biomedical Engineering and Science (IJBES) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from BIOEN 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals · Bioscience & Engineering: An International Journal (BIOEJ) · International Journal of Advances in Biology (IJAB) · Ecology: An International Journal (ECOJ) Important Dates · Submission Deadline : November 05, 2023 · Authors Notification : December 07, 2023 · Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : December 09, 2023 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : bioen@bioen2024.org or bioenconf@yahoo.com Submission URL: https://bioen2024.org/submission/index.php
